name: BInputMask
desc: Component For Input Masking Using Custom Mask Type and Predefined Mask Types
sample: <BInputMask hintText='Hint Text' floatingText='Floating Text' errorText='Field is required' value='987623' onFocus={myFocusEvent()} onblur={myBlurEvent()} onChange={myChangeEvent()} maxLength=7  />

infoArray.name: counterLabelShow
infoArray.desc: Shows the counter label if set to true. Default is false.

infoArray.name: disabled
infoArray.desc: Disables the text field if set to true. Default is false.

infoArray.name: errorStyle
infoArray.desc: The style object to use to override error styles.

infoArray.name: errorText
infoArray.desc: The error content to display.

infoArray.name: floatingLabelFocusStyle
infoArray.desc: The style object to use to override floating label styles when focused.

infoArray.name: floatingLabelShrinkStyle
infoArray.desc: The style object to use to override floating label styles when shrunk.

infoArray.name: floatingLabelStyle
infoArray.desc: The style object to use to override floating label styles.

infoArray.name: floatingLabelText
infoArray.desc: The content to use for the floating label element.

infoArray.name: fullWidth
infoArray.desc: If true, the field receives the property width 100%. Default is false.

infoArray.name: hintStyle
infoArray.desc: Override the inline-styles of the TextField's hint text element.

infoArray.name: hintText
infoArray.desc: The hint content to display.

infoArray.name: inputStyle
infoArray.desc: Override the inline-styles of the TextField's input element. When multiLine is false: define the style of the input element. When multiLine is true: define the style of the container of the textarea.

infoArray.name: maxLength
infoArray.desc: Limit of the input text's character length.

infoArray.name: mask
infoArray.desc: To apply mask to the input. If type is selected as 'custom', mask has to be assigned.

infoArray.name: multiLine
infoArray.desc: If true, a textarea element will be rendered. The textarea also grows and shrinks according to the number of lines. Default is false.

infoArray.name: noWrap
infoArray.desc: If true, the text inside input does not go down line. Default is true.

infoArray.name: rows
infoArray.desc: Number of rows to display when multiLine option is set to true. Default is 1.

infoArray.name: rowsMax
infoArray.desc: Maximum number of rows to display when multiLine option is set to true.

infoArray.name: style
infoArray.desc: Override the inline-styles of the root element.

infoArray.name: textareaStyle
infoArray.desc: Override the inline-styles of the TextField's textarea element. The TextField use either a textarea or an input, this property has effects only when multiLine is true.

infoArray.name: type
infoArray.desc: Specifies the type of input to display such as CreditCard', 'IBAN', 'MobilePhoneNumber' or 'Custom'. Default is 'Custom'.

infoArray.name: underlineDisabledStyle
infoArray.desc: Override the inline-styles of the TextField's underline element when disabled.

infoArray.name: underlineFocusStyle
infoArray.desc: Override the inline-styles of the TextField's underline element when focussed.

infoArray.name: underlineShow
infoArray.desc: If true, shows the underline for the text field. Default is true.

infoArray.name: underlineStyle
infoArray.desc: Override the inline-styles of the TextField's underline element.

infoArray.name: value
infoArray.desc: The value of the text field.

infoArray.name: bottomRightInfoEnable
infoArray.desc: If false, bottomright info disabled, default is true

infoArray.name: bottomRightInfo
infoArray.desc: The value of info at bottom of textfield

infoArray.name: onBlur
infoArray.desc: Callback function that is fired when the user looses the focus of textfield.

infoArray.name: onChange
infoArray.header: function(event: object, value: string, saltValue: string, isCorrectValue: bool) => void
infoArray.desc: Callback function that is fired when the textfield's value changes.

infoArray.name: onFocus
infoArray.desc: Callback function that is fired when the user focuses textfield.

infoArray.name: onKeyDown
infoArray.desc: Callback function that is fired when a key is down.
